item.title: Comment on Steel Path: Exequias – Zealoid Prelate (Solo) by Ken
item.dc:creator: Ken
item.description: Love the article!! I used this method to clear this on SP. One other thing I did that I found really helpful was using Naramon with Power Spike. With the tactics you've described, it pretty much completely stops the melee combo from expiring.
item.content:encoded: Love the article!! I used this method to clear this on SP. One other thing I did that I found really helpful was using Naramon with Power Spike. With the tactics you’ve described, it pretty much completely stops the melee combo from expiring.

item.title: Comment on Mine of Karishh Solo â€“ Grendel Mission (Systems) by Dan
item.dc:creator: Dan
item.description: You might also mention that the same Hildryn build that is so survivable/damaging that you recommended for the other missions works here too for a bit more active of an approach. This can speed up the mission time by quite a bit if you can get more than the minimum out of each extractor. Thanks for these Grendel guides, super helpful!
item.content:encoded:
You might also mention that the same Hildryn build that is so survivable/damaging that you recommended for the other missions works here too for a bit more active of an approach. This can speed up the mission time by quite a bit if you can get more than the minimum out of each extractor.
Thanks for these Grendel guides, super helpful!

item.title: Comment on Steel Path Build – Clear The Origin System Efficiently by vamsi
item.dc:creator: vamsi
item.description: fine so no pics, ignis wraith build for upto 130-150 level grineer or any heavy caliber maxed with forma + serration maxed with forma + galvanized chamber rank 9 with forma + vital sense maxed with forma + critical delay maxed with forma + primed cryo rounds rank 9 with forma + vile accelaration maxed with forma + maligant force maxed + vigilante supplies maxed with forma. (oh god this took like 10 minutes to write
